20101207074749.000|20101207074751.000|CCO|FROM THE WATER.
20101207074751.000|20101207074752.429|CCO|>> WHAT'S STRANGE ABOUT THE 
20101207074752.429|20101207074753.857|CCO|SILVER CARP IS THEY JUMP.

20101207074755.286|20101207074756.714|CCO|THE MOTION OF THE BOAT, 
20101207074756.714|20101207074758.143|CCO|DISTURBING THE WATER, CAUSES 
20101207074758.143|20101207074759.571|CCO|THESE FISH TO JUMP UP INTO THE 
20101207074759.571|20101207074801.000|CCO|AIR.
20101207074801.000|20101207074803.000|CCO|>> Reporter: SMACKING BOATERS 
20101207074803.000|20101207074805.000|CCO|ARE SUCH FORCE -- THAT THEY DRAW
20101207074805.000|20101207074807.000|CCO|BLOOD AND BREAK BONES.
20101207074807.000|20101207074809.000|CCO|>> ONE OF THE BIG ONES GOT ME 
20101207074809.000|20101207074811.000|CCO|RIGHT IN THE FACE.
20101207074811.000|20101207074812.429|CCO|>> THERE HAVE BEEN PEOPLE

20101207074816.714|20101207074818.143|CCO|TOURNAMENT IS HELD TO CATCH 
20101207074818.143|20101207074819.571|CCO|THEM -- 
20101207074819.571|20101207074821.000|CCO|>> YA-HOO!
20101207074821.000|20101207074823.500|CCO|>> Reporter: -- IN EVERY 
20101207074823.500|20101207074826.000|CCO|CONCEIVABLE WAY.
20101207074826.000|20101207074828.500|CCO|BUT AS AMUSING AS THEY APPEAR, 
20101207074828.500|20101207074831.000|CCO|THE HIGH-FLYING FISH ARE A 
20101207074831.000|20101207074833.000|CCO|DANGEROUS THREAT THAT COMES FROM
20101207074833.000|20101207074835.000|CCO|TWO KINDS OF ASIAN CARP.
20101207074835.000|20101207074837.000|CCO|THE SMALLER SILVER ONES THAT 
20101207074837.000|20101207074839.000|CCO|JUMP AND BIG HEAD CARP THAT GROW
20101207074839.000|20101207074841.000|CCO|UP TO 100 POUNDS, EATING SO MUCH
20101207074841.000|20101207074843.500|CCO|PLANKTON IN THE FOOD CHAIN THAT 
20101207074843.500|20101207074846.000|CCO|NATIVE FISH CANNOT SURVIVE, 
20101207074846.000|20101207074848.500|CCO|MULTIPLYING SO FAST THAT MORE 
20101207074848.500|20101207074851.000|CCO|THAN 4,000 CARP INFEST EVERY 
20101207074851.000|20101207074852.667|CCO|MILE IN PARTS OF THIS RIVER.
20101207074852.667|20101207074854.333|CCO|THERE IS THE HIGHEST DENSITY OF 
20101207074854.333|20101207074856.000|CCO|ASIAN CARP IN THE WORLD IN THE 
20101207074856.000|20101207074857.667|CCO|ILLINOIS RIVER.
20101207074857.667|20101207074859.333|CCO|THAT'S INCLUDING THEIR NATIVE 
20101207074859.333|20101207074901.000|CCO|HABITATS IN CHINA. 
20101207074901.000|20101207074902.667|CCO|>> Reporter: THAT'S FRIGHTENING.
20101207074902.667|20101207074904.333|CCO|>> IT'S ASTOUNDING. 
20101207074904.333|20101207074906.000|CCO|>> Reporter: NO ONE IS MORE 
20101207074906.000|20101207074907.667|CCO|FRIGHTENED THAN FISHERMEN IN THE
20101207074907.667|20101207074909.333|CCO|GREAT LAKES WHERE SPORT AND
